          <title>
            <string language="en">Functions of T lymphocytes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funktionen der T Lymphozyten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fonctions des lymphocytes de T</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Funções de lymphocytes de T</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Funzioni dei linfociti di T</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λειτουργίες των λεμφοκυττάρων τ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Funciones de los linfocitos de T</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration describes the response of T lymphocytes when they encounter an antigen in contact with another host cell.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">antigen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">B cells</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">T lymphocytes</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung beschreibt die Antwort der T 
Lymphozyten, wenn sie ein Antigen in Verbindung mit einer anderen 
Wirtszelle antreffen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration décrit la réponse des 
lymphocytes de T quand ils rencontrent un antigène en contact avec 
une autre cellule hôte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração descreve a resposta de 
lymphocytes de T quando encontram um antígeno no contato com uma 
outra pilha de anfitrião.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione descrive la risposta dei 
linfociti di T quando incontrano un antigene in contatto con un'altra 
cellula ospite.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση περιγράφει την απάντηση των 
λεμφοκυττάρων τ όταν αντιμετωπίζουν ένα αντιγόνο σε επαφή με 
ένα άλλο κύτταρο ξένιου χ/υ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración describe la respuesta de los 
linfocitos de T cuando encuentran un antígeno en contacto con otra 
célula huesped.</string>
          </description>
